Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory75.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Why is this Nanami so damn elusive?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Can't shake her off when you're stuck with her. Can't find her when you need her.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I'll focus on the mission, I guess. Gray Raven has joined the operation as well. I must complete it before that Lucia.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "...I'll get to the cellar if I blow up this wall. I'm not heading down fighting one floor at a time like all the other squads.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory41.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Guard', 3: 'Detention area breached—detention area breached... Inmates taken—test subjects insufficient...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: 'Locking on test subject... Do not run... Protect test subject...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: 'Invader found...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: '(Struck by a sudden explosion) Protect—t-test subject...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "I can't believe something like this is down here!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "...?! They're all humans!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Test Subject', 3: "Don't... don't jab me...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Test Subject', 3: 'Infect—i-infect—i-infect...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'These are all equipment for biochemical tests... and all these people... are tied on those glass chairs...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'That... is dried blood on those chairs.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'And rotten human flesh.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Test Subject', 3: '(Bangs the back of his head on the chair) Infect! Infect! Infect!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "They've all gone mad!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: '(Looks at the flesh underneath through the skin of the test subject) The skin is new... the tissues underneath are all mush...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'The bones... are all rotten...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "That's what happens to organic begins after being infected by the Punishing Virus.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "But why isn't his skin affected?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "(Notices the tube inserted into his skin) ...No matter what they're injecting him with, it only stays on the surface level of his skin.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Hey! Don't move! (Removes the tube from his arm) ...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "(Cuts the tube and inspects its interior) If I couldn't magnify my visual input... tch... I wouldn't have noticed these residues...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: '(Extends the nano-scalpel from her nail) Just... a little bit... a little bit...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: '(Puts the residue into the retriever) ...of this yellow material.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "It looks like the golden antigen in the air. I'll send the analysis to the cloud for now. I'm not losing this data because of a fight.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'But if the comms is disrupted, then so is the network channel.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I'll have to set up a transmission terminal myself to upload the report...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: '...How annoying!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Why do I have to do everything myself?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Let's see what I can use around here...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: "Guard's Vocal Unit", 3: '(Vocal unit flashing red) Infect—warning... Infect—w-warning...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The infection within the test subjects suddenly spreads. They twitch violently at first, then their flesh melts into a pool of goo...'}
{3: 'Karenina stands there frozen, and there is nothing she can do...'}
